wikipedia_page.main: Michael McGoldrick is a Gaelic footballer who plays for the Derry county team. He plays his club football for Bellaghy Wolfe Tones.

response: A combination of Bellaghy's defensive screen system and tight man-marking by Michael McGoldrick kept Bradley relatively quiet in both games. However, he scored the winning point in the injury-time to secure the Championship for Glenullin.

Michael McGoldrick (born 1971) is an Irish flute and tin whistle player.
Michael McGoldrick may also refer to:
* Michael McGoldrick (murder victim) (1965–1996), Northern Irish murder victim
